messages.title: A message from Barry Jones
messages.content: I have lived in north east Hampshire for 33 years, union rep for Wilts County Council workers 22 years, school governor.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Have the strength to demand a living wage for all workers.
End privatisation and bring services back into public ownership.
Use compulsory purchase powers to buy back land sold under 'help to buy'.
Ensure proper road surfaces on all public and new housing estate roads.
Schools have the funding they need to deliver high-quality education.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can keep the Tories out here.

issues.brexitEurope: Respect the result of the referendum, but reject a hard tory brexit.
issues.economy: Have the strength to demand a living wage for all workers.
issues.education: Schools have the funding they need to deliver high-quality education.
issues.health: End the privatisation and bring services back into public ownership. Tackle the mental health crisis.
issues.socialWelfare: Social justice for the many not the few.

housing.content: Use compulsory purchase powers to buy back land sold under 'help to buy'. Ensure housing developments include a mix of private and truly affordable homes.

politicalExperience.role: Union rep for Wilts County Council workers

images.caption: Barry Jones for North East Hampshire

leaflet.additionalNotes: I have the experience. A vote for Barry is a vote for a better future for us all.
